message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. Given its value, I'm offering it at $18,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $18,000 might have been a little high, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than I can go.  How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget at $15,000. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle again, but this time closer to my budget?
